sources.title: Abandoned Dead | Full Horror Thriller Movie | Sarah Nicklin
sources.description:
Abandoned Dead - A security guard, trapped in a run-down inner-city medical clinic, is terrorized by supernatural forces which threaten to overtake her.
2015.  Stars: Ivan Adame, Hannah Johnson, Sarah Nicklin

metadata.Plot: Rachel, a security guard who harbors a fear of the dark, is sent on assignment to secure an abandoned medical rehab clinic. It's a place with a supernatural history, where people have mysteriously disappeared. Alone and afraid, Rachel is tormented throughout the night by paranormal terrors, as she discovers the dead who reside here may be connected to buried secrets from her past.
metadata.Actors: Ivan Adame, Hannah Johnson, Sarah Nicklin
